title: Please just Tristana's jump
body:
Look, I'm ok with her having one of the best escape abilities in the game, but please PLEASE for the love of god make it less safe. 

As Rengar when I jump from my ULTIMATE she can jump completely out of my combo even before I land. 
As Katarina she can legit jump out of my Shunpo even before I "blink" to her.

Like....why can this one ADC deal arguably of the highest amounts of damage in game, while being able to siege well, splitpush, shove lanes+farm really well have this obnoxious escape ability along with a knockback that is pretty much a "nope" tool.....

She needs a rework at the very least.
